attributes.action: lower fuel prices when the barrel of oil is cheap
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why do we have to pay more for petrol when the price of oil is low and has been alot lower example when the price of oil in the states falls the petrol prices drop when the pice of oil rises the petrol rises .here when the barrel prices go down we dont see the change but when it rises our pump go really high

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
